lock-section.desc-1: Lock your YFI for veYFI to take part in Yearn governance.
lock-section.desc-2: Please note, governance is currently the only use for veYFI until the full platform launches ‘soon’. Stay tuned anon.
lock-section.header: YFI holders, time to Lock' ‘N Load

extend-section.desc-1: Want to lock for longer? Extend your lock period to increase your gauge boost weight.

exit-section.desc-1: Or you can exit early by paying a penalty based on lock duration.
